On Tuesday, November 26, 2002, at 12:16  PM, Dave Winer wrote:

> Let's end the whining now.

Okay, please do. ;-)

> I don't really care about REST.

You don't really understand REST, Dave. ;-)  You just said "I don't 
really care about the Web."

jb
